t: Introducing Amazon Autos: Buy your next car on Amazon in 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon Autos offers online automotive shopping from Hyundai dealers across major metropolitan areas nationwide (see full list below). We continue to add more Hyundai dealerships, and next year, we will roll out additional manufacturers, brands, cities, and new functionality.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Autos FAQs: Amazon Autos
s: Amazon Autos is a partnership between participating local Hyundai dealerships and Amazon that allows you to browse and purchase or lease a car from a dealership through Amazon.com. Vehicles listed at Amazon Autos are sold or leased by participating local dealerships, not by Amazon.

t: Echo Auto Smart Speaker | 2nd Gen | 2022 Release | Amazon
s: Echo Auto is designed to enable Alexa hands-free features, such as play music, make calls, answer text messages and more for cars that don't have a voice assistant built-in. Echo Auto connects to the Alexa app on your phone using your existing data plan and plays through your car’s speakers ...

t: Amazon Autos to Help Dealers Sell Used Cars | PYMNTS.com
s: March 19, 2025 - The company began rolling out the Amazon Autos offering in December, saying in a press release that it was partnering with automotive dealers and brands to bring the Amazon experience to the car-buying process.

s: December 10, 2024 - “We’re partnering with dealers and brands to redesign car shopping — making it more transparent, convenient, and customer-friendly,” Fan Jin, global head of Amazon Autos, said in a statment.

t: Starting Today You Can Buy a Car on Amazon in These 6 Cities - Newsweek
s: January 7, 2025 - Hyundai won't be the only automaker to sell vehicles on Amazon. The website sees about 300 million visits per day across the globe buying everything from kitchen utensils to circuit boards to gardening sheds. Amazon says it will expand with other automotive brands in 2025.
